body:
Day 9 - Manga 86
Still shitty as fuck but at least it wasn't Evangelion.
Also, Samurai Jack really is leaving the life now.
3/10.
i don't know what to say, 2/10?
0/10 I litteraly hated this shit, if you can cum to this then you are truly sick and depraved, hats off to you my senior degenerate.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.
